20101207220807.667|20101207220809.333|CCO|LIVE A GOOD LIFE AND IN THAT 
20101207220809.333|20101207220811.000|CCO|CONTEXT, SHE WON.

20101207220817.667|20101207220821.000|CCO|ESPECIALLY HER YOUNG CHILDREN TO
20101207220821.000|20101207220823.000|CCO|FILL THE VOID THAT WOULD COME.
20101207220823.000|20101207220825.000|CCO|IT WAS FIRST DIAGNOSED IN 2004 
20101207220825.000|20101207220827.000|CCO|RIGHT AFTER THE ELECTION.
20101207220827.000|20101207220829.000|CCO|I REMEMBER BEING THERE WHEN 
20101207220829.000|20101207220831.000|CCO|KERRY CONCEDED.

20101207220832.667|20101207220834.333|CCO|BOSTON MASS GETTING THIS 
20101207220834.333|20101207220836.000|CCO|DIAGNOSIS.
20101207220836.000|20101207220837.667|CCO|2007, THE RECURRENCE WAS 
20101207220837.667|20101207220839.333|CCO|DIAGNOSED AND MORE RECENTLY, 
20101207220839.333|20101207220841.000|CCO|AFTER GOING THROUGH LOTS OF 
20101207220841.000|20101207220843.000|CCO|TREATMENT, HER DOCTOR SAID THAT 
20101207220843.000|20101207220845.000|CCO|IT WAS NO LONGER TO AGGRESSIVELY
20101207220845.000|20101207220847.000|CCO|TREAT IT.
20101207220847.000|20101207220849.000|CCO|IT HAD SPREAD.
20101207220849.000|20101207220851.000|CCO|SO SHE HAD BEEN PREPARING, 
20101207220851.000|20101207220853.000|CCO|ESPECIALLY FOR HER YOUNGER 
20101207220853.000|20101207220855.000|CCO|CHILDREN.
20101207220855.000|20101207220857.000|CCO|SHE HAD LOST HER FIRST BORN, 
20101207220857.000|20101207220859.000|CCO|WADE, AND THEY'RE ASKING THAT IN
20101207220859.000|20101207220901.000|CCO|LIEU OF FLOWERS, ANYTHING LIKE
